sMart.Classes

Class RefrigeratedTruck

  • java.lang.Object
    • sMart.Classes.Truck
      • sMart.Classes.RefrigeratedTruck

  • public class RefrigeratedTruck
extends Truck
    Refrigerated truck is an object which inherits from the abstract class Truck. It contains the properties of Truck, with the addition of the property temperature.
    Author:
    Lara de Maroussem

      Inherited from Truck, this method adds an Item to RefrigeratedTruck cargo if item is not temperature controlled.

      Inherited from Truck, this method calculates the cost of a RefrigeratedTruck based on the variable cargo quantity.
      java.lang.Boolean checkFull(java.util.List<Item> cargo)
      Inherited from Truck, this method returns a boolean value to check if RefrigeratedTruck is full.
